nodes.text: Star Wars: Build the Millennium Falcon 26

Star Wars: Build the Millennium Falcon 26 is the twenty-sixth issue of Star Wars: Build the Millennium Falcon. The parts of the Millennium Falcon model included in that issue are lower hull and corridor parts, plus an assembly jig.

It's stated that the EF76 Nebulon-B escort frigate was affiliated with the Galactic Republic in the ship's technical specifications infobox. The issue further states that the Nebulon-B was introduced after the Clone Wars under the Galactic Empire.
